h2201.definition: and (feminine) זְעָקָהxlit zᵉâqâh corrected to zᵉʻâqâh; from {{h2199}}; a shriek or outcry; cry(-ing).

h2202.definition: from an unused root (meaning to be fragrant); Ziphron, a place in Palestine; Ziphron.

h2203.definition: from an unused root (meaning to liquify); asphalt (from its tendency to soften in the sun); pitch.

h2204.definition: a primitive root; to be old; aged man, be (wax) old (man).

h2205.definition: from {{h2204}}; old; aged, ancient (man), elder(-est), old (man, men and...women), senator.

h2206.definition: from {{h2204}}; the beard (as indicating age); beard.

h2208.definition: properly, passive participle of {{h2204}} (used only in the plural as a noun); old age; old age.

h2210.definition: a primitive root; to life, i.e. (figuratively) comfort; raise (up).

h2211.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h2210}}; to hang, i.e. impale; set up.

h2212.definition: a primitive root; to strain, (figuratively) extract, clarify; fine, pour down, purge, purify, refine.

h2213.definition: from {{h2237}} (in the sense of scattering); a chaplet (as spread around the top), i.e. (specifically) a border moulding; crown.

h2214.definition: from {{h2114}} (in the sense of estrangement) (compare {{h2219}}); disgust; loathsome.

h2215.definition: a primitive root; to flow away; wax warm.

h2216.definition: from {{h2215}} and {{h894}}; descended of (i.e. from) Babylon, i.e. born there; Zerubbabel, an Israelite; Zerubbabel.

h2218.definition: from an unused root meaning to be exuberant in growth; lined with shrubbery; Zered, a brook East of the Dead Sea; Zared, Zered.

h2219.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2114}}); to toss about; by implication, to diffuse, winnow; cast away, compass, disperse, fan, scatter (away), spread, strew, winnow.

h2220.definition: or (shortened) זְרֹעַ; and (feminine) זְרוֹעָה; or זְרֹעָה; from {{h2232}}; the arm (as stretched out), or (of animals) the foreleg; figuratively, force; arm,   help, mighty, power, shoulder, strength.

h2221.definition: from {{h2232}}; something sown, i.e. a plant; sowing, thing that is sown.

h2222.definition: by reduplication from an unused root meaning to flow; a pouring rain; water.

h2223.definition: by reduplication from {{h2115}}; properly, tightly girt, i.e. probably a racer, or some fleet animal (as being slender in the waist); greyhound.

h2224.definition: a primitive root; properly, to irradiate (or shoot forth beams), i.e. to rise (as the sun); specifically, to appear (as a symptom of leprosy); arise, rise (up), as soon as it is up.

h2225.definition: from {{h2224}}; a rising of light; rising.

h2226.definition: the same as {{h2225}}; Zerach, the name of three Israelites, also of an Idumaean and an Ethiopian prince; Zarah, Zerah.

h2227.definition: patronymically from {{h2226}}; a Zarchite or descendant of Zerach; Zarchite.

h2228.definition: from {{h2225}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has risen; Zerachjah, the name of two Israelites; Zerahiah.

h2229.definition: a primitive root; to gush (as water); carry away as with a flood, pour out.

h2230.definition: from {{h2229}}; a gush of water; flood, overflowing, shower, storm, tempest.

h2231.definition: feminine of {{h2230}}; a gushing of fluid (semen); issue.

h2232.definition: a primitive root; to sow; figuratively, to disseminate, plant, fructify; bear, conceive seed, set with sow(-er), yield.

h2233.definition: from {{h2232}}; seed; figuratively, fruit, plant, sowing-time, posterity; × carnally, child, fruitful, seed(-time), sowing-time.

h2235.definition: or זֵרָעֹן; from {{h2232}}; something sown (only in the plural), i.e. a vegetable (as food); pulse.

h2236.definition: a primitive root; to sprinkle (fluid or solid particles); be here and there, scatter, sprinkle, strew.

h2237.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2114}}); perhaps to diffuse, i.e. (specifically) to sneeze; sneeze.

h2238.definition: of Persian origin; Zeresh, Haman's wife; Zeresh.

h2239.definition: from {{h2219}}; the spread of the fingers, i.e. a span; span.

h2240.definition: of uncertain derivation; Zattu, an Israelite; Zattu.

h2241.definition: apparently a variation for {{h2133}}; Zetham, an Israelite; Zetham.

h2242.definition: of Persian origin; Zethar, a eunuch of Xerxes; Zethar.

h2243.definition: by contraction from {{h2245}}; properly, a cherisher, i.e. the bosom; bosom.

h2244.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2245}}); to secrete; × held, hide (self), do secretly.

h2245.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2244}}, {{h2247}}); properly, to hide (as in the bosom), i.e. to cherish (with affection); love.

h2246.definition: from {{h2245}}; cherished; Chobab, father-in-law of Moses; Hobab.

h2247.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2245}}); to secrete; hide (self).

h2248.definition: (Aramaic) from {{h2255}}; properly, overthrown, i.e. (morally) crime; hurt.

h2249.definition: from {{h2266}}; united; Chabor, a river of Assyria; Habor.

h2250.definition: or חַבֻּרָה; or חֲבֻרָה; from {{h2266}}; properly, bound (with stripes), i.e. a weal (or black-and-blue mark itself); blueness, bruise, hurt, stripe, wound.

h2251.definition: a primitive root; to knock out or off; beat (off, out), thresh.

h2252.definition: or חֲבָיָהlemma חֲבָיה missing vowel, corrected to חֲבָיָה; from {{h2247}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has hidden; Chabajah, an Israelite; Habaiah.

h2254.definition: a primitive root; to wind tightly (as a rope), i.e. to bind; specifically, by a pledge; figuratively, to pervert, destroy; also to writhe in pain (especially of parturition); × at all, band, bring forth, (deal) corrupt(-ly), destroy, offend, lay to (take a) pledge, spoil, travail, × very, withhold.

h2255.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h2254}}; to ruin; destroy, hurt.

h2256.definition: or חֵבֶל; from {{h2254}}; a rope (as twisted), especially a measuring line; by implication, a district or inheritance (as measured); or a noose (as of cords); figuratively, a company (as if tied together); a throe (especially of parturition); also ruin; band, coast, company, cord, country, destruction, line, lot, pain, pang, portion, region, rope, snare, sorrow, tackling.

h2257.definition: (Aramaic) from {{h2255}}; harm (personal or pecuniary); damage, hurt.

h2258.definition: or (feminine) חֲבֹלָה; from {{h2254}}; a pawn (as security for debt); pledge.

h2259.definition: active participle from {{h2254}} (in the sense of handling ropes); a sailor; pilot, shipmaster.

h2260.definition: from {{h2254}} (in the sense of furnished with ropes); a mast; mast.

h2261.definition: of uncertain derivation; probably meadow-saffron; rose.

h2262.definition: of uncertain derivation; Chabatstsanjah, a Rechabite; Habazaniah.

h2263.definition: a primitive root; to clasp (the hands or in embrace); embrace, fold.

h2264.definition: from {{h2263}}; a clasping of the hands (in idleness); fold.

h2265.definition: by reduplication from {{h2263}}; embrace; Chabakkuk, the prophet; Habakkuk.

h2266.definition: a primitive root; to join (literally or figuratively); specifically (by means of spells) to fascinate; charm(-er), be compact, couple (together), have fellowship with, heap up, join (self, together), league.

h2267.definition: from {{h2266}}; a society; also a spell; charmer(-ing), company, enchantment, × wide.

h2268.definition: the same as {{h2267}}; community; Cheber, the name of a Kenite and of three Israelites; Heber.

h2269.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h2266}}; an associate; companion, fellow.

h2270.definition: from {{h2266}}; an associate; companion, fellow, knit together.

h2272.definition: by reduplication from {{h2266}}; a streak (like a line), as on the tiger; spot.

h2275.definition: from {{h2267}}; seat of association; Chebron, a place in Palestine, also the name of two Israelites; Hebron.

h2276.definition: or חֶבְרֹנִי; patronymically from {{h2275}}; Chebronite (collectively), an inhabitant of Chebron; Hebronites.

h2277.definition: patronymically from {{h2268}}; a Chebrite (collectively) or descendants of Cheber; Heberites.

h2279.definition: feminine active participle of {{h2266}}; a joint; which coupleth, coupling.

h2280.definition: a primitive root; to wrap firmly (especially a turban, compress, or saddle); figuratively, to stop, to rule; bind (up), gird about, govern, healer, put, saddle, wrap about.

h2281.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to cook (compare {{h4227}}); something fried, probably a griddle-cake; pan.

h2282.definition: or חָג; from {{h2287}}; a festival, or a victim therefor; (solemn) feast (day), sacrifice, solemnity.

h2283.definition: from an unused root meaning to revolve (compare {{h2287}}); properly, vertigo, i.e. (figuratively) fear; terror.

h2284.definition: of uncertain derivation; a locust; locust.

h2285.definition: the same as {{h2284}}; locust; Chagab, one of the Nethinim; Hagab.

h2286.definition: or חֲגָבָה; feminine of {{h2285}}; locust; Chagaba or Chagabah, one of the Nethinim; Hagaba, Hagabah.

h2287.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2283}}, {{h2328}}); properly, to move in a circle, i.e. (specifically) to march in a sacred procession, to observe a festival; by implication, to be giddy; celebrate, dance, (keep, hold) a (solemn) feast (holiday), reel to and fro.

h2288.definition: from an unused root meaning to take refuge; a rift in rocks; cleft.

h2290.definition: or חֲגֹר; and (feminine) חֲגוֹרָה; or חֲגֹרָה; from {{h2296}}; a belt (for the waist); apron, armour, gird(-le).

h2291.definition: from {{h2287}}; festive; Chaggi, an Israelite; also (patronymically) a Chaggite, or descendant of the same; Haggi, Haggites.

h2292.definition: from {{h2282}}; festive; Chaggai, a Hebrew prophet; Haggai.

h2293.definition: from {{h2282}} and {{h3050}}; festival of Jah; Chaggijah, an Israelite; Haggiah.

h2294.definition: feminine of {{h2291}}; festive; Chaggith, a wife of David; Haggith.

h2295.definition: of uncertain derivation; probably a partridge; Choglah, an Israelitess; Hoglah. See also {{h1031}}.

h2296.definition: a primitive root; to gird on (as a belt, armor, etc.); be able to put on, be afraid, appointed, gird, restrain, × on every side.

h2298.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h2297}}; as card. one; as article single; as an ordinal, first; adverbially, at once; a, first, one, together.

h2300.definition: a primitive root; to be (causatively, make) sharp or (figuratively) severe; be fierce, sharpen.
